content: Hi my fellow Bitcoiners, this is my very first Raffle. Hope i`m doing this right.This beautiful coin (#6) is officially sold out and of course in mint condition.Coin Info: https://www.powercoin.it/en/oceania-south-pacific/6273-bitcoin-cyber-orange-1-oz-silver-coin-2-niue-2021.htmlMiner Jones has the item in hand. Shipping and escrow is on buyers side.This raffle will have 16 slots (0-9 and A-F) and the winner will be picked on the basis of the hash of a block which will be determined when all spots are taken and paid for. The final character of that hash will win the price. Price per slot: 0.0005 Btc (multiple slots per person is ok for me)Payment address: 3LeictKzdGdBwwtGbeH4sMd6vUJKfGJHzm 1.2.3.4.5.6.7.8.9.0.a.b.c.d.e.f.https://imgur.com/BzvKZt0 https://imgur.com/w7FakFbhttps://imgur.com/Oo1WTushttps://imgur.com/dLO9pyd
